abstract: The New York Times Company has a letter of intent to sell the online resource guide to Answers.com, an online question-and-answer site, for $270 million, according to a person familiar with the negotiations.
snippet: The New York Times Company has a letter of intent to sell the online resource guide to Answers.com, an online question-and-answer site, for $270 million, according to a person familiar with the negotiations.
lead_paragraph: 8:56 p.m. | Updated The New York Times Company, which has been shedding assets and focusing on its core newspaper and Web site, is preparing to sell another of its properties.

headline.main: Times Co. Said to Reach Preliminary Deal to Sell About.com
headline.print_headline: Paring Assets, Times Co. Seeks to Sell About Group
